name: Super Makeover for Teeth, Spa, hair, Nail, Dressup
name_original: Super Makeover for Teeth, Spa, hair, Nail, Dressup
description: A Super Makeover is a multilevel makeover experience of a lifetime. This amazing game will take you to many exciting places where miraculous transformations occur: a pretty girl turns into a stunning and elegant young lady. In Super Makeover you will need to complete nine exciting levels: a visit to the beauty salon, a relaxing day at the spa, a great experience at the gym, a pampering moment at the nail salon, a new hairdo at the hair salon, a visit to the makeup salon and a great shopping spree to the best clothing store. Try all the options in all the levels to achieve the best results. Each one of these levels is part of the story of the super makeover a girl has to go through to be truly gorgeous. The amazing super makeover will be obvious from the first moment. Your amazing work of transforming this cute model will be so rewarding at the end and you will be able to see the results in a fantastic before and after picture, which I am sure will amaze you. Enjoy this fascinating game called Super Makeover!
